paths.description: A list of paths which are available on this map.

items.description: A single path, which is a list of nodes.

x.description: The X position of this node.

y.description: The Y position of this node.

scale.description: The scale of spheres on this node. Defaults to 1.

hidden.description: When set, the segment from this to next node will be hidden - the spheres will become darker, unshootable, and they will be rendered behind non-background sprites.

warp.description: When set, the spheres will instantly teleport to the next node once they reach this node.

sprites.description: A list of sprites to be drawn on this map.

x.description: The X position of this Sprite.

y.description: The Y position of this Sprite.

path.description: The path to the Sprite to be displayed.

internal.description: When set, the path field will refer to this map's folder as the base directory. Otherwise, the base directory will be the root game folder.
internal.markdownDescription: When set, the `path` field will refer to this map's folder as the base directory. Otherwise, the base directory will be the root game folder.

background.description: If set, this sprite will be rendered behind all spheres. Otherwise, it will be covering hidden spheres.
